Name: Flood
column13: Destroy a species with 1+ Red \Gene and no Black \Gene.

Name: Heat Wave
column13: Destroy a species with 1+ Red \Gene, 1+ Blue \Gene and 2+ Black \Gene.

Name: Drought
column13: Destroy a species with 1+ Red \Gene and 2 Blue \Gene.

Name: Hurricane
column13: Destroy a species with 1+ Red \Gene and 1+ Purple \Gene.

Name: Extinction2
Description: Have more Purple \Gene than any other color.

Name: Desert
Description: Have exactly 2 Red \Gene and no other \Gene.

Name: Jungle
Description: Have 2+ Red \Gene and less than 3 Blue \Gene.

Name: Prairie
Description: Have a species with 1+ Red \Gene and 2+ Purple \Gene.

Name: Tide Pool
Description: Have a species with 6+ Blue \Gene and no Black \Gene.

Name: Mountain
Description: Have a species with 1+ Red \Gene and 4+ Blue \Gene.

Name: Ocean
Description: Have a species with 2+ Purple \Gene and no Blue \Gene.

Name: Coral Reef
Description: Have a speceis with 9+ \Gene of one color.

Name: Volcano
Description: Have a species with Total value of \Trait 5+.

Name: Arctic
Description: Have a species with Total value of \Gene 8+.

Name: Trigger Extinction
Description: Resolve the top card of the Extinction deck.
